channel.title: Need some help with vice city
channel.description: I've downloaded the grand theft auto vice city game some time ago..Added a few mods and stuff.But i cannot listen to the radio.Anybody got any idea how i can make the radio work? It'll be a big help. Thanks in advance.

item.title: Need some help with vice city
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

Nah i just downloaded the no dvd crack.I only have $50 aus dollars and i want to save it.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help with vice city

item.title: Need some help with vice city
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

If you downloaded both CDs, try mounting the second one and playing. IIRC, there was an option to install the radio files near the end of the installation though…

Read full topic
